title: Open new tab to the right of the currently selected tab
author: LIyoai
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Tab should open next to the current tab

## Current Behavior
Tab is opened at the far right.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Open two connections
2. Select first connection
3. Open third connection

## Your Environment
* Version used: 1.77.1.27713
* Operating System and version (e.g. Windows 10 1709 x64): Windows 10 1709 x64

iterations.description: UX enhancement to insert new connection tabs immediately after the currently active tab rather than appending at the end of the strip.

notes:
AI triage (claude): UX enhancement to insert new connection tabs immediately after the currently active tab rather than appending at the end of the strip.
Approach: When a new connection panel/tab is created, determine the current active tab index in DockPaneStripNG and insert the new tab at index+1 instead of appending to the end of the tab collection.
